task: Select a category for the expense record.
task_end_condition: The task is known to be completed when Jade Green successfully chooses a category from the list.

working_memory.description: Touch on a button that has text "Category:, Food - Breakfast"

After touching the button labeled "Category: Food - Breakfast," the screen transitioned to the "CategorySelection" page, where a new textview displaying "Category" and a list of various category options, such as "Food," "Clothing/Beauty," and "Transportation," were introduced. Additionally, the previous selections related to expenses were replaced with options for categorizing expenses. (page changed from AddNewRecord to CategorySelection)
Touch on a button that has text "Breakfast"
